traits.Earth Glide: The dao can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the dao doesn't disturb the material it moves through.
traits.Elemental Demise: If the dao dies, its body disintegrates into crystalline powder, leaving behind only equipment the dao was wearing or carrying.
traits.Sure-Footed: The dao has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.Multiattack: The Dao makes two fist attacks or two maul attacks.
actions.Fist: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d8 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Maul: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d8 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18+1d8 + 14 Strength check or be knocked prone.
